definitions.definition: A flat-bottomed, straight-sided, glass vessel , with a lip and often a small spout , used as a laboratory container .
A drinking vessel without a handle .
An ancient bell-shaped ceramic pot with a wide mouth , narrow neck, and flaring body, used by the Beaker people during the late Neolithic and early Bronze Age.

main_definition: A flat-bottomed, straight-sided, glass vessel , with a lip and often a small spout , used as a laboratory container .
secondary_definitions: A drinking vessel without a handle .
( archaeology ) An ancient bell-shaped ceramic pot with a wide mouth , narrow neck, and flaring body, used by the Beaker people during the late Neolithic and early Bronze Age.
